QuestData.Title: Do Your Part
QuestData.Description:
The b-b-barber shop? I'm sorry, what? You want to know where the barber shop is?
I'm sorry $r, do you know there is a W-A-R going on right now?
Speaking of which, what have you done for the Alliance lately? Get out there and slay some Horde, or I'll shave your head myself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enable War Mode and slay 1 Horde Player within the world.
